description:
The course aims to identify the job skills, establish and differentiate the steps for job search. You will learn to use various technological tools for efficient job search and how to become visible and relevant in the field of your interest. Maybe you are a recent graduate and looking for an opportunity in the workplace and you want to re enter and want to meet new market dynamics. This course will teach you how to do and what means to use for effective searching. 

                                            Syllabus
                        Each week, experts will develop a major theme through short videos, reference materials and community forums on the Telescope.

Week 1:  Induction of platform and community forums Telescope
Week 2:  Market and labor skills
Week 3:  Stages of the job search
Week 4:  Basic tools for job search
Week 5:  Keys to Effective Searching
Final Project for course certification
title: Preparación para la Búsqueda de Empleo
